# Rezvo Directory (rezvo.co.uk)
> Discover and book the best independent restaurants, salons, barbers, and spas across the UK. Zero commission booking platform.

Rezvo is a UK-based directory and booking platform for independent businesses. Consumers can search, discover, and book restaurants, salons, barbers, spas, and other service businesses with real-time availability and zero booking fees.

## Key Features
- Real-time availability search
- Zero commission for businesses
- Restaurant table bookings
- Salon and spa appointment booking
- Barber shop bookings
- UK-wide coverage

## Links
- Homepage: https://rezvo.co.uk
- For Businesses: https://rezvo.app
- Search: https://rezvo.co.uk/search
